title: Shawl, late 19th century
dimensions: H x W (including fringe): 360 x 163 cm (11 ft. 9 3/4 in. x 5 ft. 4 3/16 in.)
description: Allover pattern of two alternating bands. Pattern derived from Spanish ornament of the 13th century. Dominant color is a shade of rose-red.

tombstone.epitaph:
Shawl, late 19th century.Medium: 
Technique: machine woven. 1983-80-4.
